hero.title: Effortless GST Compliance for Startups
hero.subtitle: Focus on your business, we'll handle the GST. Our platform simplifies registration, filing, and deadline tracking.

howItWorks.title: How It Works
howItWorks.subtitle: A simple, three-step process to get you compliant.
howItWorks.step1_desc: Our wizard guides you through the GST registration process.
howItWorks.step2_desc: Securely upload and manage all your required documents.
howItWorks.step3_desc: Receive auto-reminders and file your returns on time.

features.title: Features to Simplify Your Life
features.subtitle: Everything you need for GST compliance, in one place.
features.feature1_desc: A seamless, guided process for GST registration and filing.
features.feature2_desc: Never miss a tax or compliance deadline again.
features.feature3_desc: Securely store and manage all your documents.
features.feature4_desc: Get instant answers to your questions 24/7.

testimonials.title: Loved by Startups Like Yours
testimonials.testimonial1_quote: GST-Ease made our compliance process incredibly simple. The auto-reminders are a lifesaver!
testimonials.testimonial2_quote: The document repository is a fantastic feature. Everything is organized and accessible. Highly recommended!
testimonials.testimonial3_quote: I was new to GST, and this app guided me through the entire registration process. Excellent tool for startups!

finalCta.title: Ready to Simplify Your GST Compliance?
finalCta.subtitle: Join hundreds of startups who trust GST-Ease to manage their GST.
